screen.flyspeed.settings.title: Flyspeed Settings
screen.flyspeed.settings.subtitle: Boost speed while flying with Hold, Toggle, or Always mode.
screen.flyspeed.settings.tip: Survival boost may trigger anti-cheat checks on servers you do not own.
screen.flyspeed.warning.title: Survival Boost Warning
screen.flyspeed.warning.line1: Only use survival flight boost on servers you own or trust.
screen.flyspeed.warning.line2: Many anti-cheat plugins treat high fly speed as cheating.
screen.flyspeed.warning.line3: You can be kicked or banned on other servers.
